Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-la
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: Tyasa pascata usako samudayamathi hamile akasabata kunai sena utarenaum ra hamile yasaprakara utarne pani gardainaum
Tyo ta matra e'uta pracanda citkara thiyo. So uniharu sabai ekkasi nibhihale
Aphasoca cha (yasta) sevakaharumathi! Ki jo rasula pani uniharuko pasama ayo, uniharule usako upahasa gare
Ke uniharule dekhenan ki uniharubhanda pahila kati naslaharula'i hamile nasta garyaum, aba tiniharu unitira pharkera a'unechainan
Jati pani samuha chan sabai hamrai, sam'mukha upasthita gara'inechan
Ra e'uta nisani uniharuko lagi sukhkhabhumi ho. Hamile tyasala'i jivita paryaum ra tyasabata anna ubjayaum, jasabata yiniharu khanchan
Ra hamile tyasama khajura ra amguraharuko bagaincaharu paida garyaum ra tyasama hamile jharana jari garidi'eka chaum
Taki manisaharule tyasaka phala kha'un ra unaka hataharule tyasala'i bana'eko ho'ina ani pheri kina uniharule abhara prakata gardainan
ati pavitra cha allaha jasale sabaiko jodi srsti garyo, cahe tyo matoma umari'eka kuraharu ho'un, ra svayam tiniharuka (astitvaka) cinhaharu ho'un cahe ti vastuharu ho'un jasabare tiniharu jandainan
Ra uniharuko lagi e'uta nisani rata ho. Jasabata hamile dinala'i tanihalchaum, ani tyasabela uniharu ekkasi amdhyaroma parna janchan
Ra surya aphno nirdharita margama himdirakhcha. Yo nirdharita gari'eko ho, adhipatyasali, sarvajnani allahako tarphabata
Ra candrako hamile tha'umharu nirdharita gareka chaum, yahamsam'ma ki pharkera (ghatda–ghatdai) purano hamgako jastai bha'ihalcha
Na suryabata nai yo hunasakcha ki usale camdala'i ga'era samatihalos ra na rata nai dinabhanda pahila a'una sakcha. Ra sabai aphna paridhima akasama ghumirakheka chan
Ra e'uta nisani uniharuko lagi yo cha ki hamile uniharuka santatila'i bhari'eko dungama savara garyaum
Ra uniharuko nimti usaiko sadrsya aru pani yasta kuraharu srsti garyaum, jasamathi uniharu savara hunchan
Ra yadi hamile caheko bha'e uniharula'i duba'i dinthyaum, ani nata uniharuko kohi yacana sunnevala hunecha ra na unala'i baca'inthyo
Tara hami aphno tarphabata daya gardachaum ra eka niscita samayasam'ma tiniharula'i pha'ida di'irahanchaum
Ra jaba uniharusita bhanincha ki pahilaka ra pachi hune papaharubata bamca, taki timimathi daya gariyos
Ra uniharuko pasama uniharuko palanakartaka nisaniharumadhye kunai pani nisani yasto a'ena jasabata uniharu bevasta nagare

Ra jaba unisita bhanincha ki, ‘‘juna jivika timila'i allahale di'ekocha, tyasamadhyebata kehi (dana) kharca gara.’’ Ta yi kaphiraharu mominaharusita bhandachanh ki ‘‘hamile ti manisaharula'i kina khuva'une, jasala'i yadi allahale caheko bha'e svayam khuva'idinthyo? Timi ta spasta bhulama chau.’’
Tiniharu bhandachanh ‘‘ki yadi timi samco hau bhane bata'u tyo vacana kahile pura hunecha?’’
Yiniharule ta e'uta thulo citkarako pratiksama chan, jasale uniharula'i (tyasa avasthama) a'i samatnecha jaba ki yiniharu eka'apasama jhagada garirakheka hunechan
Pheri tyasa bela yiniharule nata icchapatra garna saknechan ra nata aphna gharavalaharutira pharkana saknechan
Ra sura (singa) phumkine bittikai yiniharu sabai aphna cihanaharubata (niskera) aphno palanakartatira dagurnechan
Bhannechanh ‘‘haya–haya kasale hamila'i nidrabata jaga'idiyo? Yahi ho jasako rahamanale vacana di'eko thiyo. Ra rasulaharule samco kura bhaneka thi'e’’
Ani e'uta thulo citkara hunecha. Ta uniharu sabai ekkasi hamro samu upasthita gara'ihaline chan
Yasa dina kunai vyaktimathi kunai pani an'yaya hunechaina ra timila'i pratiphalako rupama tyahi prapta hunecha juna timile gardai a'iraheka thiyau
Svargavalaharu ajako dina kunai nakunai kamama vyasta bha'i ananda li'irakhnechan
Uniharu ra unaka patniharu pani chamyama palangaharuma takiya laga'era baseka hunechan
Tyaham uniharuko nimti haraprakaraka phalaharu hunechan. Ra uniharu je cahanchan upalabdha hunecha
Dayavan palanakartako tarphabata uniharumathi salama bhaninecha
Ra he aparadhiharuh aja timi alaga bha'ihala
He adamaka santati! Ke hamile timisita vacana li'eka thi'enaum? Ki timi saitanako puja nagarnu. Niscaya nai tyo timro spasta satru ho
Ra mero nai upasana garnu, yahi nai sojho bato ho
Ra saitanale ta timiharumadhye dherai pranila'i pathabhrasta garidiyo ke timisamga bud'dhi thi'ena
yo tyahi narka ho jasako timila'i vacana di'i'eko thiyo
(Tasartha) ‘‘timile gareko kuphrako badala prapta garna aja yasama (narkama) pravesa garihala.’’
Aja hamile unaka mukhaharuma chapa laga'idinechaum ra jejati yiniharule gardai a'eka thi'e, uniharuka hatale hamisita varnana garnechan, ra unaka khuttaharu saksi bannechan
Yadi hamile caheko bha'e unaka amkhaharu nasta (garera andha) garidine thiyaum. Pheri uniharu batotira daudirahanthe tara uniharule kasari dekhna sakdathe
ra yadi hamile caheko bha'e uniharuko tha'ummai uniharuko rupa bigarna sakthyaum, ani tyahambata uniharu na agadi jana sakchan na pachadi pharkana saknechan
Ra jasala'i hamile dirghayu dinchaum, usala'i usako janmako avasthama pharka'idinchaum. Ke tiniharule taipani bujhdainan
na hamile yasa nabila'i kavita sika'eka chaum ra na yo usako lagi suha'umcha. Yo ta matra nasihata (upadesa) ra spasta kura'ana ho
Taki usale tyasta sabaila'i saceta garide'os jo jivita chan. Ra kaphiraharumathi duskarma pramanita bha'ija'os
Ke uniharule dekhadainan? Ki hamile uniharuko nimti aphno hatabata bana'i'eka kuraharumadhye caupaya banayaum ra jasako aba uniharu svami bha'eka chan
Ra ti pasuharula'i hamile uniharuko ajnapalaka bana'idiyaum, jasamadhye kehi ta uniharuko lagi savariko rupama chan ra tiniharumadhye kehika masu uniharule khanchan
Ra uniharuko nimti tiniharuma aru kaiyan labha chan ra peya padartha pani. Ta ke tiniharule krtajnata prakata gardainan
ra uniharule allahala'i chadi arula'i pujya bana'umchan taki tyasabata uniharula'i maddata pugos
Yadyapi tiniharule uniharuko maddatako ksamata rakhdainan, tapani musrikaharu uniharuko (bahudebavadiko) phaujako rupama upasthita chan
Atah uniharuko kurale tapa'inla'i sokakula nagarun. Yiniharule jejati luka'umchan ra jejati prakata gardachan, hamila'i ramrosamga pratyaksa, paroksa sabai thaha cha
Ke manisala'i yati pani jnana chaina ki hamile usala'i paniko thopabata srsti garyaum? Ani tyo pratyaksa jhagadalu banihalyo
Ra usale hamro barema tulana garnathalyo ra aphno paida'isa (srsti) la'i birsihalyo. Bhannathalyo kih (jaba) ‘‘hadaharu sadigali saknechan taba yinala'i kasale jivita garisaknecha?’’
Tapa'im javapha dinus kih ‘‘uniharula'i usale jivita parnecha, jasale uniharula'i pahilo pataka srsti gareko cha, jo pratyeka srstila'i ramrari jandacha
Uhi ho jasale timro nimti hariyo vrksabata ago paida garidiyo. Ta timile tyasadvara ago salka'umchau.’’
Jasale akasaharu ra jaminala'i srsti gareko cha, usala'i samathrya chaina ki uniharu jastai pheri srsti garide'os? Kina ho'ina, jaba ki tyo mahan srasta atyanta jnanavana cha
Usako garima yo ho ki jaba usale kunai kurako (srsti garne) iccha gardacha taba usale yati bhannu paryapta huncha ki, ‘‘bha'ihala’’! Ani tyo bha'ihalcha
Atah pavitra cha tyo allaha, jasako hatama pratyeka kurako pura adhikara cha. Ra usaitira timi pharkera a'unechau
Kasama cha pankti bamdhnevalaharuko
Pheri baliyorupale hapka'unevalaharuko
Ani kura'ana padhnevalaharuko
Nihsandeha timiharu sabaiko pujya e'utai cha
Akasaharu ra dharati ra je–jati kuraharu yinama chan, sabaiko ra sampurna purvi disaharuko malika pani uhi ho
Hamile sansariya akasala'i taraharubata susajjita garyaum
Atteri saitanabata suraksita rakhnako nimti
Mathika pharistaharuko kura sunnako lagi tiniharule kana laga'una saktainan. Apitu sabaitirabata tiniharu marinchan
Ra (tyahambata) dhapa'inula'i. Uniharuko nimti stha'i yatana cha
Ho, kasaile (svargadutako kurala'i) yadi kehi sunihalcha bhane turuntai prajvalita agoko dallole usala'i pachya'umcha
Yi kaphiraharusamga sodha ki ke uniharuko srsti garne kama adhika kathina cha, va ti an'ya kuraharuko, jasala'i hamile srsti gareka chaum. Hamile uniharuko srsti (manisako) lesilo matole garyaum
Baru timi ta ascaryama chau ra uniharu upahasa garirakheka chan
Ra jaba uniharula'i upadesa garincha ta uniharule mandainan
Ra jaba kunai nisani (camatkara) dekhdachan ta khilli uda'umchan
Ra bhandachan: ‘‘Yo ta matra e'uta pratyaksa jadu ho.’’
Ke jaba hamiharu marisakeka hunechaum ra mato ra haddiko rupama parinata hunechaum ta ke pheri samccai hami utha'inechaum
‘‘ke hamibhanda pahilaka hamra babu baje pani?’’
Tapar'im bhanidinus ki ‘‘ho! Ra timi apamanita pani hunechau.’’
Tyo ta e'uta thulo avaja hunecha. Ki yiniharu tyasabela ekkasi dekhna thalnechan
Ra bhannechanh ‘‘aphasoca cha hamila'i. Yahi nai pratiphalako dina ho.’’
Yo nai nirnayako dina ho, jasala'i timile jhutha thandathyau
Atyacara garneharula'i ra unaka sathiharula'i ra allaha baheka jasaka uniharule puja gardathe
Uniharu sabaila'i jam'ma garera narkako bato dekha'ide'u
Ra uniharula'i rokirakha, kinabhane uniharusita kehi jaruri prasnaharu sodhnucha
‘‘Timiharula'i ke bha'eko cha ki yasa bela eka arkako sahayata gardainau?’’
Baru aja ta uniharu sabai ajnakari baneka chan
Tiniharu eka–arkatira pharkera savala ra javapha garnechan
Bhannechanh ‘‘timi ta hamro pasama hamro dayam tirabata a'umdathyau.’’
Uniharule bhannechanh ho'ina ‘‘baru, timi nai imanavala thi'enau
Ra hamro timimathi kunai adhikara ta thi'ena, baru timiharu atteri thiyau
Aba ta hamro sambandhama hamro palanakartako yo kura pura bha'ihalyo ki aba hami sajayako svada cakhnechaum
Atah hamile timila'i pani pathabhrasta garyaum. Hami ta svayam pani margavicalita nai thiyaum.’’
Atah uni sabai tyasadina sajayama eka arkako sahabhagi hunechan
Hamile aparadhiharusita yastai garne gardachaum
Uniharuko yo avastha thiyo ki jaba uniharusita bhaninthyoh ‘‘ki allaha baheka kohi satya upasya chaina’’ taba tiniharu avajna gardathe
Ra bhandatheh ‘‘ke hamile e'uta unmadi kavile bhandaima aphna upasyaharula'i chadide'aum?’’
‘‘Ho'ina, baru nabile satya (dharma) li'era a'eka chan ra (aghika) rasulaharula'i sacca bhandachan
Niscaya nai timi duhkhada yatanako svada cakhnechau
Timila'i tyasaiko pratiphala di'inecha juna timile garne gardathyau.’’
Tara jo allahaka visesa bandaharu (bhaktaharu) chan
Uniharuko lagi allahadvara jivika nirdharita cha
Hara prakaraka phalaphula ra gaurava ra maryadale unako adara garinecha
Anukampale bhari'eka jannataharuma
palangaharuma amunne–samunne virajamana hunechan
uniharuko majhama visud'dha peyako patra ghuma'inecha
juna ki sapha ra pi'uneharuko lagi sarvatha susvadaka hunecha
Na tyasabata ta'uko dukhnecha ra na tyasabata manisa nasama bahakanechan
ra uniharuko pasama apsaraharu hunechin jasako amkha tala jhukeko ra thula–thula hunechan
Manaum uniharu suraksita and'aharu hun
Ani uniharule eka–arkatira mukha pharka'era prasna garnechan
Uniharumadhyebata e'utale bhannechah ki ‘‘mero e'uta sathi thiyo
Jasale bhandathyo, ki ke timi pani (kayamatala'i) manilinevalamadhyeka hau
ke jaba hami marera mato ra haddima parinata bha'isakne chaum taba ke hamila'i pratiphala prapta hunecha?’’
(Ani) bhannechah ‘‘ki ke timi usala'i ciya'era herna cahanchau?’’
(Yasaibica) tyasale (svayam) ciya'une cha, ta usala'i narkako majhama (jaliraheko) dekhnecha
Bhannechah ki, ‘‘allahako kasama! Timile ta mala'i barabadai parne thiyau
Yadi mero palanakartako krpa nabha'eko bha'e ta ma pani uniharumadhyekai hunthem jo narkama upasthita gara'i'eka chan
Ke (yo samco ho ki) hami aba marnechainaum
Pahilo pataka marnu baheka. Ra hamila'i yatana pani hunevala chaina’’
ani ta spasta cha ki nihsandeha yo thulo saphalata ho
Yasto (saphalataharu) ko lagi karma garneharule karma garnupardacha
Ke yo atithya ramro cha va thuhara (si'umdi) ko vrksa
hamile tyasa brksala'i atyacariharuko nimti kastadayaka pariksa bana'eka chaum
Nihsandeha tyo e'uta rukha ho jo jahannamako (narkako) tallo bhaga (jara) bata umrane cha
Tyasaka hamgaharu saitanaka ta'ukoharu jasta hunchan
Narkavalaharu usaibata khanchan ra usaibata peta bharnechan
Ani tyasa (khana) ko sathama unala'i tato pani misa'era di'inecha
Ani uniharula'i narka (agoko dhisko) tira pharka'inecha
Niscita mannus uniharule aphna babu–bajeharula'i margavicalita nai pa'e
Rah uniharu tiniharukai padacinhama dagurirakheka chan
Uniharubhanda pahila pani dherai manisaharu margavicalita bha'isakeka chan
Jasama hamile uniharuko majhama saceta garnevala (rasula) patha'eka thiyaum
Tasartha herihala ki jasala'i saceta gari'eko thiyo, uniharuko parinama kasto bhayo
ho, allahaka visista dasaharu baheka (unako parinama dherai ramro bhayo)
Ra hamila'i ‘‘nuhale’’ pukare, ta hera hami kasto ramrari yacana svikara garnevala haum
Hamile unala'i ra unaka gharavalala'i thulo (mahan jalapralya) vipattibata bacayaum
Ra hamile unako santatila'i bamki rahanevala banayaum
Ra hamile unako sucarca pachi a'unevalaharuma bamki rakhyaum
Sampurna sansaraharuma nuhamathi ‘‘salama’’ hos
Nihsandeha hamile bhala'iko karya garneharula'i yastai puraskara dinchaum
Uni hamra imanavala sevakaharumadhyeka thi'e
Ani hamile aruharula'i duba'idi'aum
Ra ‘‘ibrahima’’ pani unaika sahadharmiharumadhyeka thi'e
Jaba uni aphno palanakartako samaksa vikararahita hrdaya li'era a'e
Jaba unale aphno pita ra aphno jatibandhuka manisaharusita bhaneh ‘‘timile kuna kurako puja gardachau?’’
Ke timi allaha baheka managadhante upasyaharu cahiraheka chau
yo bata'u ki timile akhira sampurna sansarako palanakartala'i ke samjheka chau
aba unale taraharumathi drstipata gare
Ra bhaneh ma ta birami chu.’’
Yasapachi uniharule pithyum pharka'i unala'i chadera pharkihale
Ani (ibrahima) uniharuka upasyaharutira tatkala ga'e ra bhannathale kih timile khana kina khamdainau
timila'i ke bha'eko cha? Ki timi boldainau?’’
Ani purai saktika satha uniharula'i dahinehatale pitana suru gare
Taba uniharu unako pasama dagurdai a'e
Unale bhaneh ‘‘timiharule yasto kurako kina puja garchau? Jasala'i timile svayam kumdera bana'umchau
Jaba ki timila'i ra timile bana'eka kuraharula'i allahale nai srsti gareko cha?’’
Uniharule bhaneh ‘‘usako nimti e'uta bhavana (agnikunda) tayara pari tyasala'i prajvalita agoma halide'u’’
Uniharule ta ibrahimasamga e'uta sadayantra garna cahe tara hamile uniharula'i nai apamanita garyaum
Ra ibrahimale bhaneh ma ta pravasa garera aphno palanakartatira ga'irakheko chu, usale avasya mero margadarsana garnecha
He mero palanakarta! Mala'i asala santana pradana gara.’’
Taba hamile unala'i e'uta sahanasila putrako subhasucana diyaum

Ani jaba tyo bacca unako sathama daudadhupa garne avasthama pugyo taba unale bhaneh ‘‘he mero priya chora! Maile sapanama dekheko chu ki timila'i kurbana (bali) garirakheko chu. Ta aba hera, timro ke vicara cha? ‘‘Chorale bhan'yo kih he buba! Juna adesa tapa'ila'im di'irakhi'eko cha tyasako palana garihalnus. Allahale cahyo bhane tapar'inle mala'i dhairyavan pa'unuhunecha
Arthata jaba duvaile adesa manihale, ra babule chorala'i kancatatira parera palta'e
Taba hamile unala'i pukaryaum ki, ‘‘he ibrahima
niscaya nai timile sapanala'i samco garera dekhayau. Nihsandeha hamile uttama karya garneharula'i yastai prakarale pratiphala dinchaum.’’
Vastavama yo ta e'uta spasta pariksa thiyo
Ra hamile usako (isma'ilako) sattama kurbaniko lagi e'uta thulo (pasu) diyaum
Ra hamile pachi a'une naslaharuma (ibrahimako ramro) carca bamki rakhyaum
‘‘ibrahimamathi salama hos.’’
Asala karya garneharula'i hamile yastai pratiphala dine garchaum
Niscaya nai uni hamra imanavala sevakaharumadhyeka thi'e
Ra hamile unala'i ‘‘is'hakako’’ nabi hune subhasucana pani diyaum, jo asala manisaharumadhye hunechan

Ra hamile unala'i ra ‘‘is'hakala'i’’ barakata (kalyana) diyaum ra ti duvaika santanaharuma katipaya ta asala kama garneharu pani chan, ra katipaya aphumathi khullarupale atyacara garnevalaharu pani chan
Nihsandeha hamile musa ra harunamathi pani thulo upakara gareka chaum
Ra hamile uniharula'i ra unaka jatibandhuharula'i thulo kastabata mukta garayaum
Ra hamile uniharula'i sahayata garyaum, ta uniharu prabhavi rahe
Ra hamile uniharula'i atyanta spasta kitaba pradana garyaum
Ra hamile uniharula'i sojho margama kayama rakhyaum
Ra hamile uni duvaiko lagi pachi a'unevala naslaharuma ramro carca bamki rakhyaum
‘‘Musa (alaihis'salama)’’ ra haruna (alaihis'salama) mathi salama hos
Nihsandeha hamile asala kama garneharula'i yastai pratiphala dine garchaum
Niscaya nai ti duvai hamra imanavala sevakaharumadhyeka thi'e
Ra ‘‘iliyasa’’ pani paigambaraharumadhyeka thi'e
Jaba uhamle aphna jatibandhusita bhaneh timi allahasita kina dara mandainau
ke timi ba'ala (e'uta thulo murti)la'i pukardachau, ra sarvottama srastala'i chadidinchau
allaha jo timro ra timro babu–bajeko palanahara ho
Tara uniharule unala'i jhutha bhane atah uniharu avasya narkama upasthita gara'inechan
Ho, allahaka asala sevakaharu (sajayama) parine chainan
Hamile ‘‘iliyasa’’ (alaihis'salama) ko ramro carca pachi a'uneharuma (sesa) chadeka chaum
Ki ‘‘iliyasa (alaihis'salama)’’ mathi ‘‘salama’’ hos
Hamile bhala'i garneharula'i yastai pratiphala dinchaum
Nihsandeha uni hamra momina sevakaharumadhyebata thi'e
Ra nihsandeha ‘‘luta (alaihis'salama)’’ pani paigambaraharumadhyebata thi'e
Hamile unala'i ra unaka gharavalaharu sabaila'i mukti pradana garyaum
Tara e'uta vrd'dha baheka jo pachi parnevalamadhyeki thi'i
Ani hamile aruharula'i nasta paridiyaum
Ra timi ta bihana bha'epachi uniharuka bastiharuko najikabata hidchau
Ra ratima pani, ta ke timi (makkavala) taipani bujhdainau
ra nihsandeha ‘‘yunusa (alaihis'salama))’’ pani paigambaramadhyeka thi'e
Jaba bhagera bhari'eko dungama a'ipuge
Ani tyasabela gola halda unako nama paryo
Ani machale unala'i nilihalyo ra uni aphula'i dhikkarna thaleka thi'e
Atah yadi unale (allahako) pavitratako gunagan nagareko bha'e
Ta tyasa dinasam'ma jabaki manisaharu punah jivita garinechan, usaiko petama rahanthe
Antatah hamile unala'i jaba ki uni birami thi'e, khulla maidanama halidiyaum
Ra unimathi hamile chayam garne e'uta bota umaryaum
Ra hamile unala'i eka lakha va tyasabhanda pani dherai manisaharutira (paigambara bana'era) pathayaum
Ani uniharule imana lya'e ra hamile uniharula'i eka avadhisam'ma sukha bhogne avasara pradana garyaum
Uniharusita sodhah ‘‘ke timro palanakartaka choriharu ra yiniharuka choraharu chan
va hamile pharistaharula'i stri bana'umda uniharu (tyasabela) upasthita thi'e?’’
Savadhana raha, yiniharu aphule jhutha raceko (kura) matra bhandachan
Ki ‘‘allahaka santana chan.’’ Nihsandeha yiniharu ekadama jhutha hun
Ke allahale aphno lagi choraharuko damjoma choriharula'i ruca'eko cha
timila'i ke bha'eko cha. Kasto n'yaya gardachau
ke timile yati pani bujhdainau
va timro pasama usako kunai pramana cha
yadi timi samco hau bhane, ta aphno kitaba prastuta gara

Ra uniharule ta allaha ra jinnaharuko bicama pani nata sthapita gareka chan, huna ta jinnaharula'i ramrari thaha cha ki yasto kurama visvasa garneharu avasya samati'era (yatanama) upasthita gara'inechan
Uniharule jejati allahako barema varnana garchana, allaha tyasabata purnarupale pavitra ra ucca cha
Tara allahale visista sevakaharula'i (yatanama parnechaina)
Visvasa gara timi ra jasala'i timi pujdachau
(Allahako virodhama) kasaila'i vicalita gara'una sakdainan
Tiniharu baheka jo narkama janevala (narkiya) chan
Ra (pharistaharu bhandachan ki) hamimadhye pratyekako eka sthana niscita cha
Ra hami ta (svargaduta) allahako bhaktima aphno sthanama panktivad'dha chaum
Ra allahako mahanata ra sresthata bayana (varnana) gardachaum
Kaphiraharule bhanne gardathe
ki ‘‘yadi hamro samaksa pahileka manisaharuko varnana bha'eko bha'e
Ta hami pani allahaka visista sevaka hunethyaum.’’
Tara pheri yasa kura'anasamga kuphra garna puge, tasartha aba sighra nai uniharula'i (parinama) thaha bha'ihalnecha
Ra hamro (sandesa purya'une) rasulaharusita hamro vayada (vacana) pahila nai bha'isakeko cha
Ki niscaya nai uniharuko sahayata garinecha
Ra niscaya nai hamro sena nai prabhavi rahanechan
atah eka avadhisam'ma tapa'i uniharusita vimukha rahanu
ra uniharula'i herirakhnus. Ra yiniharule pani sighra nai (kuphrako parinama) dekhihalnechan
Ke uniharu hamro yatanako nimti hatara garirakheka chan
Tara jaba hamro yatana uniharuko amganama utrancha taba jasala'i bhaya suna'i'eko thiyo, uniharuko nimti naramro dina hunecha
Eka avadhisam'ma tapa'ile uniharuko vicara chodidinus
Ra herdai garnus, yiniharule pani sighra nai (parinama) dekhihalnechan
Pavitra cha tapa'iko palanakarta jo dherai sam'manita ra mukta cha ti kuraharubata juna yiniharule varnana gardachan
Paigambaraharu mathi salama cha
Ra sampurna prasansa allahako lagi cha jo sampurna jagatako palanakarta ho
Sada, kasama cha, tyasa kura'anako, juna upadesa dinevala cha
Tara jo kaphira chan, uniharu ghamanda ra virodhama chan
Hamile uniharubhanda pahila dherai samuhala'i nasta garyaum, taba uniharule dherai kara'e tara tyo chutakarako samaya thi'ena
Ra uniharule ascarya gare ki uniharuko pasama uniharumadhyebata e'uta sacetakarta ayo ra (inkara garneharule) bhanna thaleh ki ‘‘yo ta jadugara ra jhutha ho.’’
Ke usale yati dherai pujya upasyaharula'i eklo e'utai upasya bana'idiyo? Yo ta thulai ascaryajanaka kura ho
Unaka nayakaharule yo bhandai hind'ihale ki ‘‘hinda ra aphna upasyaharu (ko puja) ma dati raha. Nihsandeha yasa kurama kunai svartha (nihita) cha
Yo kura ta aghika dharmama pani hamile kahilyai sunenaum. Yo bilakulai managadhante kura ho

Ke hami sabaimadhyebata yasaimathi allahako adesa avatarita bha'eko ho? Vastavama uniharu mero vahyako visayama sandehama chan?’’ Baru (satya yo ho ki) uniharule ajhaisam'ma mero yatanako svada cakheka chainan?’’
Va ke uniharuko pasama timro dinevala mahan palanakartako dayaka khajanaharu chana
va ke akasaharu ra jamina ra jejati uniharuko bicama chan ti, (sabai) mathi unaiko adhipatya cha, tyasto ho bhane yiniharu dori tanera cadhihalun
Parajita samuhaharumadhye yo pani e'uta (samuhako) sena ho
Yinibhanda agadi pani ‘‘nuhako’’ kauma ra ‘‘ada’’ ra mekhavala (killavala) phira'aunale jhutha bhanisakeka thi'e
Ra samuda ra ‘‘lutaka’’ kauma (jatibandhu) ra banaka basinda pani, yi nai ti samuha hun
Tiniharu pratyekale rasulaharula'i aropa laga'e tasartha mero sajaya unimathi niscita bhayo
Yiniharu ta matra e'uta citkarako pratiksama chan jasabata alikati pani avakasa hunechaina
Ra uni bhanchanh ki ‘‘he hamro palanakarta! Hamila'i hamro bhaga hisabako dinabhanda agavai di'ihala
(He paigambara!) Yiniharu je bhandachan, tyasamathi dhairya garnus ra hamro sevaka ‘‘da'udala'i’’ smarana garnus jo saktisali thi'e. (Ra) niscaya nai uni (allahatira) pravrtta thi'e
Hamile parvataharula'i unako adesako adhina garidi'eka thiyaum ki pratahkala ra sandhyako samaya unako sathama gunagana garirakhun
Ra panksiharula'i pani jo ekatra hunthe. Sabai unaka ajnakari thi'e
Ra hamile unako rajyala'i sudrdha garidi'eka thiyaum ra unala'i tatvadarsita pradana gareka thiyaum ra nirnayaka kura bhanne ksamata pradana gareka thiyaum
Ra ke timila'i vivada garneharuko samacara pani pugeko cha? Jaba uniharu parkhala cadhi ekanta kaksama a'ipuge

Juna bela uniharu ‘‘da'udako’’ pasama a'e, tyatikhera uni uniharusita tarsihale. Uniharule bhane ki bhaya nagara, hami duvaiko e'uta mudda cha ki, hamimadhye e'utale arkosita an'yaya gareko cha, tasartha tapa'inle hamrobicama thika–thika nirnaya garidinus. Ra an'yaya nagarnuhola ra hamila'i sojho bato dekha'idinus
(Kura yo cha ki) yo mero bha'i ho. Yasaka unansaya bhend'iharu chin ra mero pasama e'uta dumbi matra che. Yasale bhancha ki, yasala'i pani mala'i sumpide, ra kurama mamathi jabarajasti gardacha

Unale bhaneh ke ‘‘yasale timro dumbila'i aphno dumbiharuma misa'ine kura garera, nihsandeha timimathi an'yaya gardacha. Adhikatara sajhedaraharu eka arkamathi jyadati nai garne gardachan. Ho, jasale imana lya'e ra asala karma gare, tiniharu baheka, ra yasta nikai kama chan.’’ Ra ‘‘da'udale’’ thane ki (yasa ghatanabata) hamile unako pariksa gareka haum taba unale aphno palanakartasita ksamayacana gare ra pascatapa gardai sajada gare ra allahatira pravrtta bha'e
Taba hamile pani unala'i ksama garyaum ra niscaya nai uni hamro najikaka ra uttama sthanavala hun

He da'uda! ‘‘Hamile dharatima timila'i uttaradhikari bana'eka chaum. Atah timile manisaharuko bicama satyatako satha phaisala garnu ra aphno vyaktigata icchako anupalana nagarnu ki tyasale timila'i allahako margabata vicalita gara'idinecha, juna manisaharu allahako margabata vicalita hunchan, niscaya nai uniharuko nimti kathora yatana cha, kinabhane uniharule hisabako dinala'i birsidi'e
Ra hamile akasa ra dharatila'i ra je–jati uniharuko bicama cha, vyarthama srsti gareka ho'inaum. Yo uniharuko soca'i ho jo kaphira chan. Tasartha kaphiraharuko lagi narkako yatana cha
Juna manisaharule imana lya'e ra asala karma garirakhe, ke uniharula'i hamile tiniharu saraha garidinchaum jasale dharatima upadrava gardachan, va pheri sanyamiharula'i duracariharu jasto garidiyaum
(yo) dherai anugrahayukta kitaba ho, juna hamile tapa'immathi avatarita gareka chaum. Taki manisaharule yasaka ayataharuma socavicara garun ra bud'dhivalaharule yasabata siksa grahana garun
Ra hamile ‘‘da'udala'i’’ ‘‘sulaimana’’ namako chora pradana garyaum. Uni dherai ramro banda (bhakta) thi'e, niscaya nai uni allahatira pravrtta hunevala thi'e
(Smarana gara) jaba sandhyako samayama unaka agadi ramra drutagami ghod'aharu upasthita gara'i'e
Taba bhanna thale kih ‘‘maile palanakartako smaranabata (bevasta bha'i) yi ghod'aharusamgako mayala'i ramro thanem.’’ Yahamsam'ma ki surya asta bha'isakyo
(Bhane ki) ‘‘uniharula'i mero najikama lya'u.’’ Ani uniharuko goda ra gardanama hatale musarna thale
Ra hamile sulaimana (alaihis'salama)ko pariksa garyaum, ra unako sinhasanama e'uta sarira rakhidiyaum, ani uni allahatira pravrtta bha'e
Unale bhaneh ‘‘he mero palanakarta! Mala'i ksama garide'u, ra mala'i tyo rajya pradana gara, juna ma baheka kasaiko lagi upayukta nahos. Niscaya nai timi thulo data hau.’’
Taba hamile vayula'i unako adhinama garidiyaum juna unako adesanusara, jaham uni pugna cahanthe, saralatapurvaka purya'idinthyo
Ra saktisali jinnaharula'i pani unako adhina garidiyaum, sabai bhavana bana'unevala ra gotakhora (dubakki laga'unevala) la'i
Ra aru jinnaharula'i pani jo janjirama jakadi'eka thi'e
(Hamile bhan'yaum) ‘‘yo hamro baksisa ho, aba timi bhala'i gara va roki rakha (timisita) kunai hisaba hunechaina.’’
Ra unako nimti hamikaham dherai samipyata ra uttama sthana cha
Ra hamra bhakta ‘‘ayyuba (alaihis'salama) la'i’’ pani smarana gara, jaba usale aphno palanakartala'i pukaryo ki ‘‘saitanale mala'i duhkha ra pida purya'eko cha.’’
(Hamile bhan'yaum ki dharatimathi) aphno latale hana, (hera), yo (mula), nuha'unako nimti ciso ra pi'unako nimti (mitho) pani ho.’’
Ra hamile unaka purai jahana parivara ra unako satha arula'i pani unala'i pradana garyaum. (Yo) hamro tarphabata dayaluta ra bud'dhivalaharuko nimti siksako rupama thiyo

Ra aphno hatama jhadu (kehi jharapata) li'era tyasabata hirka'u ra sapatha natoda.’’ Samco yo ho ki hamile unala'i thulo dhairyavan bhakta payaum, uni dherai ramro upasaka thi'e. Ra uni dherai dhyana rakhnevala thi'e
Hamra upasakaharu ‘‘ibrahima’’, ‘‘is'haka’’ ra ‘‘ya'akubala'i’’ smarana gara jo saktivala ra drstivala thi'e
Uniharula'i hamile akhiratako visista kurako satha sambandhita garidi'eka thiyaum
Yi sabai hamra najika roji'eka ra asala manisaharumadhyeka thi'e
Isma'ila ra ‘‘yasa'a’’ ra ‘‘julakiphlala'i’’ pani smarana gara. Uniharu sabai asala manisaharumadhyeka thi'e
Yo upadesa ho ra visvasa gara ki sanyamiharuko nimti ramro tha'um cha
Arthata (sadhaim basako nimti) jannataharu chan, jasaka dvara uniharuko nimti khulla rahanechan
Tyasama uniharu aramako satha takiyama teka laga'era baseka hunchan ra thuprai phalaphula ra thari–tharika peyapadarthako adesa garirahanechan
Ra uniharuko pasama drsti tala jhuka'irakhne samana umeravali striharu hunechin
Yi ti kuraharu hun jasako vacana hisabako dinako nimti, timisita gari'eko thiyo
Yo hamile pradana gareko jivika ho juna kahilyai samapta hunechaina
Yi (upaharaharu ta ajnakariharuko nimti) pratiphala hun ra ullanghanakariharuko nimti naramro sthana cha
(Arthata) narkacha, jasama uniharu pravesa garnechan ra tyo ekadama naramro visrama sthala ho
Yo umlirakheko tato pani ra pipa (ho), aba tyasako svada cakhun
Ra yastai prakaraka an'ya dherai yatana (hunechan)
‘‘Yo e'uta samuha ho juna timro satha(ago)ma pravesa garnecha. Uniharuko nimti kunai avabhagata hunechaina, uniharu ta narkama janevala hun
uniharule bhanne chanh ‘‘ho'ina, baru timila'i nai kunai svagata hunechain. Timile nai ta yo (vipana) hamro samu lya'eka thiyau. Yo basnako lagi naramro tha'um ho.’’
Uniharule bhannechanh he ‘‘hamro palanakarta! Jasale (kuphrako kura) pahiladekhi hamro lagi lya'eko cha, usala'i narkama dobbara yatana dinu.’’
Ra narkavalaharu bhannechanh ‘‘ke karana cha ki hamile ti vyaktiharula'i dekhdainaum, jasala'i hamile naramramadhye ganthyaum?’’
Ke hamile nai unako upahasa gareka thiyaum, va hamra amkhaharu uniharutirabata hateka chan?’’
Niscita jana narkiharuko yo apasama jhagada ta avasya hunecha
Bhanidinush ki ‘‘ma ta matra saceta garnevala hum . Ra eka allaha sarvasaktimana baheka aru kohi satya pujya chain
Jo palanakarta ho akasaharu ra dharatiko, ra je ti du'itaiko bicama chan, sabaiko malika ho, sarvasaktimana ra thulo ksamadata.’’
Bhanidinus ki ‘‘yo e'uta thulo khabara ho
jasabata timile laparavaha bha'irakheka chau
Mala'i, ti agla pharistaharuko kunai jnana thi'ena jaba uniharu vivada garirakheka thi'e
Matira ta tyo vahya matra garincha ki ma spastarupale saceta garnevala hum .’’
Jaba ki tapar'inko palanakartale pharistaharusita bhan'yo ki ‘‘ma matole manisako srsti garnevala chu
Ta jaba maile tyasala'i thikathaka garihalum ra tyasama aphno ruha (atma)phumkihalum taba timiharu usako agadi dhogihalnu.’’
Taba sabai pharistaharule dhoge(sijda gare)
Tara saitana (ibalisa)le garena. Usale ghamanda garyo ra kaphiraharumadhyeko bha'ihalyo

Allahale bhan'yoh ki ‘‘he iblisa! Juna vyaktila'i maile aphna hataharule srsti garem, tyasako agadi dhognabata timila'i kuna kurale manahi garyo, ke timile ghamanda garyau, va timi ucca padavalaharumadhyeka hau?’’
Usale javapha diyo ki ‘‘ma yasabhanda uttama chu (kinaki) timile mala'i agobata banayau ra yasala'i matobata srsti garyau.’’
Adesa bhayo tam ‘‘yahambata ga'ihala, tam tiraskrta chas
Ra tammathi kayamata (kiyamata)ko dinasam'ma mero dhikkara ra tiraskara rahanecha.’’
Usale bhan'yo, ‘‘he mero palanakarta! Mala'i tyasa dinasam'mako lagi samaya pradana gara jaba ki manisaharu utha'inechan.’’
Allahabata adesa bhayoh ‘‘timila'i mohalata di'iyo
Tyasadinasam'ma jasako samaya nirdharita cha.’’
Bhanna thalyo ki tyaso bha'e ‘‘mala'i timro pratapako saugandha ma uniharu sabaila'i vicalita garidinechu?’’
(Tara) ti baheka jo ki timra manapara'i'eka ra visista bhakta chan.’’
Adesa bhayo satya (cha) ra ma satya nai bhanne gardachu
Ki ‘‘timi ra timro anusarana garneharu sabaibata maile pani narkala'i bharidinechu.’’
He paigambara! Bhanidinus ki ‘‘ma timisita yasako kunai badalako icchuka chaina ra nata ma kunai dikhava (adambara) garnemadhyeko’’ hum
Yo (kura'ana) ta samasta sansaravalaharuko nimti upadesa ra siksa ho
Niscita cha timi yasako vastavikata kehi samayapachi jani saknechau
Yasa kitabako avatarana allaha atyanta adhipatyasali, tatvadarsiko tarphabata ho
Hamile yo kitaba timitira satyatako satha avatarita gareka haum, tasartha timi allahako upasana gara, dharmala'i khasa usaiko nimti visesa garera

Khabaradara! Upasana khasa allahakai lagi ho. Ra jasale usa baheka aru mitra bana'eka chan ra bhandachan kih ‘‘hamile yiniharula'i yasakarana pujdachaum ki hamila'i allahako samipyata prapta gara'idi'un.’’ Niscaya nai allahale uniharuko bicama tyasa kurako phaisala garidinecha jasama uniharule vivada garirakheka chan. Allahale usala'i marga dekha'umdaina jo jhutho ra akrtajna cha
Yadi allahale aphno santana caheko bha'e, usale aphno srstiharumadhyebata, jasala'i cahanthyo, rojihalthyo. Tara u ta ucca cha! Uhi allaha eklai ra sabaimathi saktiman cha

Usaile akasaharu ra dharatila'i atyanta ramro dhangale srsti gareko cha. Usale ratila'i dinamathi ra dinala'i ratimathi lapetidincha ra usaile surya ra candrala'i (niyantranama rakhera) kamama laga'eko cha. Sabai eka nirdharita samayasam'ma sancalita chan. Niscita mana u adhipatyasali ra ksamasila cha

Usale timi sabaila'i eka jyanabata srsti garyo, ani usaibata jodi banayo ra usaile timro nimti caupayamadhye atha jod'iharu (bhale–pothi) banayo. Usaile timra amaharuko petama e'uta akarapachi arko akarama srjana gardacha tina–tina amdhyaraharuma. Uhi allaha timro palanakarta ho. Satta usaiko ho, usabaheka kohi satya pujya chaina. Ani timi kaham bahakiraheka chau

yadi timi akrtajnata prakata gardachau bhane samjhirakha allaha timi sabaisita nisprha cha. Ra usale aphna bhaktaharuko krtaghnata ruca'umdaina, ra yadi timi krtajnata prakata gardachau bhane, usale yasala'i timro nimti ruca'unecha. Kasaile arkako lagi kunai bojha utha'umdaina. Ani timiharu sabaila'i aphno palanakartatira pharkijanu parnecha. Ra usale timila'i bata'idinecha, je timile garirakheka hunechau. Niscaya nai usale chatibhitrako kura pani jandacha

Ra jaba manisala'i kunai kasta pugdacha taba ramro ekagra bha'era aphno palanakartala'i pukardacha ani jaba allahale usamathi aphno anukampa gardacha, taba tyasale tyasa kurala'i birsihaldacha jasako nimti pahila pukarirakheko thiyo, ra allahako samakaksi thahara'una thaldacha, taki yasako parinamasvarupa tyasale usako margabata arula'i pani vicalita gara'ide'os. Tapar'im bhanidinus ki aphno inkarako pha'ida kehi dinasam'ma li'ihala. Antatah timi narakiharumadhyeka hunechau

Tyo vyakti jasale ratako samayama sajada (upasana) gardacha ra upasanama ubhirahancha, akhiratasita darcha ra aphno palanakartako dayako asa rakhdacha tyo ra yasako viparita garnevala ke barabara huna sakdachan? Bhana ki ‘‘ke uniharu jo jnani chan ra uniharu jo ajnani chan duvai samana hunechan? Niscitarupale siksa ta tinaile grahana garchan jo bud'dhivala (saksama) chan.’’

Bhanidinus ki ‘‘he imanavala sevakaharu aphno palanakartasita dara. Jasale sansarama asala karma garera dekha'e, uniharuko nimti ramro pratiphala cha, ra allahako dharati pharakilo cha. Dhairyavanaharukai nimti pura pura anaginta puraskara di'incha
Tapar'im bhanidinus ki ‘‘mala'i adesa bha'eko cha ki allahako upasana yasto garum ki upasana usaiko nimti samarpita garisakum
Ra yo pani mala'i adesa bha'eko cha ki sababhanda badhi ma svayam ajnakari banum .’’
Bhanidinus ki ‘‘mala'i ta aphno palanakartako avajnagarda thulo dinako yatanako bhaya lagdacha.’’
Bhanidinus ki ma ta purnarupale matra aphno allahako upasana gardachu

(Aba) timi usabaheka jasala'i cahanchau upasana gara.’’ (Ghatama hunechau) bhanidinus ‘‘vastavama noksanivala tinai hun jasale svayam aphula'i ra aphna parivaraharula'i kiyamatako dina ghatama parihale’’. Janirakha, yahi spasta ghata ho

Uniharula'i uniharuko mathibata ra uniharuko talabata pani agniko jvalaka patraharule dhamknechan. Yi nai (ti kuraharu) hun, jasabata allahale aphno sevakaharula'i dara'umcha, atah he mera sevakaharu! Masita dara mannegara.’’
Ra jasale murtiharuko pujala'i parityaga garera allahatira pravrtta bha'e, uniharuko nimti subhasandesa cha, (tasartha) mera sevakaharula'i khusiko sandesa suna'idinus
Jasale kura dhyanapurvaka sundachan ra ramro kurako anupalana gardachan yinai ti manisaharu hun jasala'i allahale margadarsana pradana garyo ra yinai bud'dhi ra vivekavala pani hun
Ta ke tyo vyakti jasako lagi sajayako kuro pramanita bha'isakeko cha tapa'inle (usala'i) narkabata mukta gara'una saknuhuncha

ho, juna manisaharu aphno palanakartasita dara manchan, tiniharuko nimti ucca mahalaharu chan jasako mathi pani ucca kaksaharu hunechan (ra)uniharuka muni naharaharu bagirakheka chan. (Yo) allahako vaca ho. Allahale aphno vacako ullanghana gardaina

Ke tapa'ile dekhnubha'ena ki allahale akasabata pani jharcha, ani tyasala'i dharatiko satahama purya'umcha. Ani tyasaibata aneka prakaraka khetiharu ubja'umcha, pheri tiniharu sukchan ra tapa'inle tinala'i pahelo rangama dekhnuhuncha. Ani usale tinala'i curacura garidincha. Yasama bud'dhimanaharuko nimti dherai siksa cha

Ke juna manisako hrdaya allahale islamako lagi kholidi'eko cha, ra tyasale aphno palanakartabata prakasa prapta gareko cha, atah uniharumathi aphasoca cha, jasaka hrdaya allahako yadabata khali bha'i kathora bha'isakeka chan yi manisaharu nai khullamakhulla margavicalanama (grasta) chan

Allahale sarvottama vani avatarita gareko cha juna yasto kitaba ho jasaka ayataharu apasama mildachan, ra dohorya'inchan, juna manisaharu aphno palanakartasita dara manchan, tyasabata uniharuko sariraka raunharu darale thado hunchan, antama unako sarira ra hrdaya allahako varnanako lagi narama ra tyasa tarpha pravrtta hunchan. Yo allahako margadarsana ho, tyasabata usale jasala'i cahancha sojho margama hinda'umcha, ra jasala'i allahale pathavicalita garidincha, usako nimti kohi margadarsaka humdaina
Aba jasale kiyamatako dina yatanabata bacna aphno anuharala'i dhala bana'umdacha, tyasto atyacariharusita bhaninechah ki ‘‘aphno karmako svada cakha.’’
Unibhanda pahilaka manisaharule pani jhutha bhane. Antatah uniharumathi tyasa tha'umbata yatana a'ipugyo, jasako barema tiniharula'i kalpana pani thi'ena
Ani allahale uniharula'i sansarika jivanama pani apamanako svada cakhayo ra ahile akhiratako yatana ta yasabhanda pani thulo cha. Kasa! Uniharule bujhun
Ra niscitarupale hamile yasa kura'anama manisaharuko nimti hareka prakaraka udaharanaharu prastuta garidi'eka chaum, taki uniharule upadesa grahana garun
Yo kura'ana arabima cha, jasama kunai truti (ra vivada) chaina, hunasakdacha uniharu sanyami banna sakun

Allahale (e'uta) udaharana prastuta gardacha ki e'uta vyakti cha, jasako aneka jiddi sajhedaraharu chan. Ra e'uta arko vyakti, tyo ho juna sampurna rupale e'utai vyaktiko dasa ho. Ke visesatako drstikonale duvaiko avastha ekasamana hunecha? Sampurna prasansa allahakai lagi ho, kintu kura yo cha ki uniharumadhye adhikansale bujhdainan
(He paigambara!) Niscita cha tapa'ila'i pani mrtyu a'unecha ra yiniharu pani marnechan
Ani timi sabai kayamatako dina aphno palanakartako samu jhagada garnechau
